title: Escape the Nautiloid
tags: find a way off the nautiloid
content:
to right: "Unleash - Aggression - Annihilate". The 'Unleash' button plays a short scene but ultimately does nothing. The middle button will cause the thralls to attack you, while the rightmost button will instantly kill them. On the left side of the room, you'll see another Mind Flayer Pod with someone inside the chamber (X:-3 Y:-347). You will also notice a control panel beside it.

As you approach the pod, Shadowheart, a Shar priest and a potential Companion, tells you to get her out of there,
